pages.name: page1

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Is there a risk of family violence?

pages.description: You can get more than 1 kind of order to protect you and your family. This service is for applying for a protection order under the Family Law act but maybe a peace bond is better for you. The next questions will help you decide if the Family Law protection order is right for you.

elements.name: ExistingFamilyCase
elements.title: Do you already have a case open in Provincial Family Court?

elements.name: ExistingPOR
elements.title: Do you need to change or add more time to a FLA protection order you already have?

elements.name: ExistingPORYes
elements.title: If you already have a FLA Protection Order, do a Form 2. You can copy most of the content from your original Form 1.

elements.name: ExistingStyleOfProceeding
elements.title: Existing Style of Proceeding
elements.description: This is at the top of the documents and usually looks like "Name vs Name2"
